name: Adlib Tracker II Instrument Bank
summary: Learn about .A2B files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: A2B files are similar to the original .BNK files used by the Reality Adlib Tracker program.

description: Instrument banks accessed by Adlib Tracker II, an audio tracking application; contains instruments used to create compositions in the Adlib Tracker II program.
